How to Play

Sushi will come by on three conveyor belts. You must prep, cut, and plate sushi as it comes by. Don't let the sushi get to the end.

Controls

  • Q W E R - Top Left Area
  • A S D F - Middle Left Area
  • Z X C V - Bottom Left Area
  • U I O P - Top Right Area
  • J K L ; - Middle Right Area
  • N M , . - Bottom Right Area
  • [ - Volume down
  • ] - Volume up
